mapper.select: SELECT p.paperId AS paperId, lp.workspaceId AS workspaceId, p.title AS title, p.year AS year, p.url AS url, ws.title AS workspaceTitle, p.categories as categoryString FROM PAPER AS p JOIN LIKEPAPER AS lp ON p.paperId = lp.paperId JOIN Workspaces AS w ON lp.workspaceId = w.workspaceId JOIN WORKSPACE as ws ON ws.workspaceID = lp.workspaceId WHERE w.email = #{username} AND w.valid = 1;
